entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning except snow at times heavy over higher terrain. Amount 10 to 15 cm except locally 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
